en: O Jehovah, the God of my salvation, I have cried day and night before thee.
hmr: Aw LALPA, a mi sandamtu Pathien, A sûn a zânin i hmaah ka khêk hlak a:

en: Let my prayer enter into thy presence; Incline thine ear unto my cry.
hmr: Ka ṭawngṭaina hi i hmaah lût sienla, Ka khêkriah i na hung sit rawh.

en: For my soul is full of troubles, And my life draweth nigh unto Sheol.
hmr: Ka hringna hi lunginzîngna- haiin a sip a, Ka hringna hin Seol chu a hung hnai ta sih a.

en: I am reckoned with them that go down into the pit; I am as a man that hath no help,
hmr: Khursûnga zu fehai laia tiemsa ka na, Hrâtna hrim hrim neilo mi ang ka nih.

en: Cast off among the dead, Like the slain that lie in the grave, Whom thou rememberest no more, And they are cut off from thy hand.
hmr: Râl thathai thlâna zâlhai anga, Mithi laia pei thlâk ka nih, Chuonghai chu i hriet ta nawh, I kuta inthawka sukbohmang an nih.

en: Thou hast laid me in the lowest pit, In dark places, in the deeps.
hmr: Khursûng hnuoihnungtakah i mîn zâltir tah a. Hmun inthimtak, inthûktakahai chun.

en: Thy wrath lieth hard upon me, And thou hast afflicted me with all thy waves. [Selah
hmr: I lunginsenna chun a mi del tlat a, Nangin i tuifâwn po po chun i mi sukrinum tah a.

en: Thou hast put mine acquaintance far from me; Thou hast made me an abomination unto them: I am shut up, and I cannot come forth.
hmr: Ka hmêlhriethai chu keia hlatah în umtir a, An ta dinga tirdakumtakah i mi siem tah a; Khârkhumin ka um a, ka suok thei naw a nih.

en: Mine eye wasteth away by reason of affliction: I have called daily upon thee, O Jehovah; I have spread forth my hands unto thee.
hmr: Rinumna leiin ka mit a se tieu tieu a, Aw LALPA, ni tin ka ko cheh a, Nanga tieng ka kuthai ka phar a.

en: Wilt thou show wonders to the dead? Shall they that are deceased arise and praise thee? [Selah
hmr: Mithihai ta ding chun thilmak i thaw ding am a nih? Thi tahnunghai chun thoin an inpâk ding che am a nih?

en: Shall thy lovingkindness be declared in the grave? Or thy faithfulness in Destruction?
hmr: I zainêmzie chu thlâna inhriettirin, I ringumzie chu Bohmangna hmuna inhriettirin a um ding am a nih?

en: Shall thy wonders be known in the dark? And thy righteousness in the land of forgetfulness?
hmr: I thilmak thawhai chu inthimah inhriettirin a um ding am a nih? I felna chu theinghilna ramah hrietin a um bawk ding am a nih?

en: But unto thee, O Jehovah, have I cried; And in the morning shall my prayer come before thee.
hmr: Aw LALPA, kei ruok chun ka ko cheh a, Ka ṭawngṭaina chun zîngkâr tuok a ti che.

en: Jehovah, why castest thou off my soul? Why hidest thou thy face from me?
hmr: LALPA, iengdinga ka hringna hi i thlauthlâk am a na? Iengdinga keia tienga i hmai i thup am a na?

en: I am afflicted and ready to die from my youth up: While I suffer thy terrors I am distracted.
hmr: Ka naupangtea inthawk rinum tuor le, thi vâng vângin ka um hlak a, I thil râpthlâktakhai ka tuorin ka thaah a mi man hlak.

en: Thy fierce wrath is gone over me; Thy terrors have cut me off.
hmr: I lunginsen nasatak chun a mi chîm tlum a, I thil râpthlâktakhai chun a mi sukbohmang tah a.

en: They came round about me like water all the day long; They compassed me about together.
hmr: Chuongchun, sûnnithlâkin tui angin an mi vêl a, An mîn huol vêl tâwl a,

en: Lover and friend hast thou put far from me, And mine acquaintance into darkness.
hmr: A mi hmangaitu le ka ruol chu a mi hlatah în umtir tah a, Ka hmêlhriethai chu inthimah în umtir ta bawk a.
